item.title: Hybrid 2-in-1s will represent a fifth of all PCs by 2020
item.description: According to new figures from IDC, which reinforce previous reports from the analyst firm (and indeed other bean counters), 2-in-1 notebooks are going to represent a large chunk of the European PC market in just over a few years' time.

item.title: THE 10 BEST GAMING KEYBOARDS FOR 2016
item.description: It's still early in the year but our sister site PCMag has already complied a list of its favorite gaming keyboards for 2016. Obviously this list will change throughout the year with new releases and updates, but these are the best picks so far.

item.title: Samsung (?) Concept PCs: The Future of Computers Looks Lame
item.description: Allegedly these PC conceptualizations are from Samsung, though I have my doubts—if they’re not, then someone else deserves credit for the least attractive concepts I’ve seen in a while. Shame, too, since we had so many decent ones lately.
